A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a die-hard Star Wars fan\, I don't see all the hate. I liked how they took a new approach while still being a little bit similar to Empire Strikes Back. Sure\, there were a couple moments that you just had to say \"whatever\"  and roll with it\, but it was overall great. I don't see how people said it was a bad story either. People say \"plot holes\" and I say \"doorways\". There is so much room to expand on this in books\, comics\, movies\, shows\, and more.
